azureLogAnalytics.query:
Heartbeat
| where Resource =="$VM"
| summarize LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated)
| extend Uptime = now() - LastSeen
| project Uptime

Heartbeat
| where Resource == "$VM"
| summarize LastHeartbeat = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| extend AgentStatus = iff(now() - LastHeartbeat > 1h, "Unhealthy", "Healthy")
| project Computer, LastHeartbeat, AgentStatus

azureResourceGraph.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| where name == '$VM'
| project resourceGroup
| distinct resourceGroup

resources
| where type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| project name
| distinct name
